de.hs_bremen.vkb

Class LatinKeyboardView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.inputmethodservice.KeyboardView
        • de.hs_bremen.vkb.LatinKeyboardView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable.Callback, AccessibilityEventSource, KeyEvent.Callback, View.OnClickListener

    public class LatinKeyboardView
extends KeyboardView
    The view that renders the keyboard for VKB (Virtual KeyBoard). It handles rendering of keys and detecting key presses and touch movements.
    Since:
    Class available since Release 1.0.0
    Version:
    Release: @package_version@
    Author:
    Tobias Groch , Florian Wolters

    • Method Detail

      • setPcAltState

        public final boolean setPcAltState(boolean bSTATE)
        Sets the state of the PC Alt key of the keyboard, if any.
        Parameters:
        bSTATE - true if the state of the PC Alt key to enable, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true if the PC Alt key state changed, false if there was no change.
        See Also:
        isPcAltActive()

      • isPcAltActive

        public final boolean isPcAltActive()
        Returns the state of the PC Alt key of the keyboard, if any.
        Returns:
        true if the key is in a pressed state, false otherwise. If there is no PC Alt key on the keyboard or there is no keyboard attached, it returns false.
        See Also:
        setPcAltState(boolean)

      • setPcCtrlState

        public final boolean setPcCtrlState(boolean bSTATE)
